titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1830.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1830.

action.text: Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution makes a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 1830 by referring to the National Purple Heart Hall of Honor, Inc. as the National Purple Heart Honor Mission, Inc.
